items.title: BlackRock Earns $260 Million From Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs Under 2 Years
items.excerpt: BlackRock has quietly turned its early foray into crypto into a lucrative venture, earning more than $260 million in annual revenue from digital asset products in less than two years.

items.title: $4.3 Billion Bitcoin and Ethereum Options Expire Today: Market Impact Analysis
items.excerpt: Crypto traders are bracing for potential market volatility as over $4.3 billion in Bitcoin and Ethereum options contracts expire today, September 19, 2025. This expiry event comes just days after the Federal Reserve’s interest rate cut, adding an extra layer of market uncertai…

items.title: Bitcoin (BTC) Price: Analyst Gives 70% Chance of New Highs in Two Weeks
items.excerpt: Bitcoin is showing strong potential for a rally toward new all-time highs, according to recent market analysis. Currently trading at around $117,000, Bitcoin has gained 8.5% this month, climbing from $107,000 ahead of the Federal Reserve’s interest rate decision.
